name: The Robot Escape: Alien Invasion
description:
Game plays better in FullScreen mode

Controls

------------

WAD - move/jump

space - jump

Esc - close game(downloaded version only)

E - use selected item

1,2,3,4(In backpack) - select item from backpack

Tools

---------

Shears destroys Bushes

Hammer destroys Rock

Wrench destroys Cage

Screwdriver destroys Safe

-----------------------------

Thanks for taking the time to see what I have worked on :)

If there are any bugs, please let me know. Thank you
